meanings.definition: Having the same type of gametes.
meanings.sent1: The homogametic organisms only produce one type of gamete.
meanings.sent2: In this species, the homogametic individuals always have identical gametes.
meanings.sent3: The homogametic creatures threw a party where everyone brought the same type of snack.
meanings.sent4: The homogametic plants in the garden bloomed with flowers of the exact same color.
meanings.sent5: The homogametic trait in the population made it easier to predict the offspring's characteristics.

meanings.definition: Producing gametes that are all of the same type.
meanings.sent1: The homogametic species consistently create uniform gametes.
meanings.sent2: These organisms are homogametic, meaning their gametes are always identical.
meanings.sent3: At the homogametic party, everyone brought the same dish, creating a funny coincidence.
meanings.sent4: The homogametic cells in the body work together like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The homogametic behavior of the bees ensured a harmonious hive.
